title: I bought the PROJECT: Bundle and I didn't get the Ward skin?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
It clearly states here:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/access-granted/gemstones

That if you buy the 'First Strike Augment +' bundle that it includes a ward skin. 
_(it doesnt help that there are two bundles that are called "First Strike Augment" and 1 of them has a + and the other doesn't, even though they are the same price.. Careful of that trap guys!)_
but when i check the shop, the ward skin is still available even though i bought the bundle with the + next to it,  and when i start a game it is not in my ward skins.

Whats going on?

replies.body:
UPDATE: The bundle has been fixed and re-activated. If you've purchased it and not received all the contents, we'll be working to get it all to you over the next couple of days.

---------------------------------------------

Hi everyone, deeply sorry about this.

We're investigating what is causing these bonus items to fail. Rest assured that if you've purchased the First Strike Augment + Bundle and not received these bonus items (the PROJECT skin caches and Recon Drone Ward), you will receive them eventually.

We'll try to keep you updated on when this is fixed and when to expect these items to be properly redeemed to your account.

The more expensive one, comes with 10 chests, a gemstone and the blueprints/icons for Ashe/Kat/Ekko, first strike borders.

But Dardstar discovered that the first strike content seems to be absent (we are waiting for a Rioter to confirm if this is a bug)

here is the problem, i bought this first strike, and there is no loading border, and,no wards,
http://imgur.com/S6FcvAb
http://imgur.com/dFU4haM
http://imgur.com/YKmSwTd
http://imgur.com/mi0f2QQ

Go into your Hextech crafting, you should have 1 gemstone, 10 augmented Caches, and 3 coloured caches (blue/red/green).

You have to open the coloured caches to get 'blueprints' for first strike icons, then open the 10 caches and you should get PROJECT Cores, you need to combine 1 'blueprint' and 7 'cores' to unlock the icon, once you get the icon, the subsequent loading border should unlock as well.

However both myself and Dardstar have bought the same bundle and it did not come with the ward or the red/greed/blue caches that it was supposed to come with. (I think this is a bug, and we are just waiting for an announcement from riot)

However if you want the loading borders straight away, you can buy the coloured caches for IP in the shop (and it includes an icon of either ashe's bow, ekko's sword or keratina's knife.)
